mapper.update: MERGE INTO TBL_SEQ_KEY A USING DUAL ON (A.SEQ_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND A.KEY_SEP =#{keySep}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.KEY_SEQ = A.KEY_SEQ+1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (A.SEQ_DT,A.KEY_SEQ,A.KEY_SEP) VALUES (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'1',#{keySep})
mapper.select: SELECT A.SEQ_DT||A.KEY_SEQ AS DATE_KEY_SEQ FROM TBL_SEQ_KEY A WHERE A.SEQ_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND A.KEY_SEP = #{keySep}
